content.raw:
Code change looks good to me :+1:

I can't solve the generated world though (but not related to this change just the fact that we use FrontElevator):
- I start the task
- drive the robot to the guest and ask him to follow the robot
- It does follow me as I'm in range, but I never enter the "pick up area" (maybe the pick up area is very small) so I now have a guest following me but I failed the checkpoint
- As I never completed the checkpoint I cannot ask the guest to stop following me (I guess I could wait for a drift and then "re-pick" him up)
content.html:
Code change looks good to me :+1:

I can't solve the generated world though (but not related to this change just the fact that we use FrontElevator): - I start the task - drive the robot to the guest and ask him to follow the robot - It does follow me as I'm in range, but I never enter the "pick up area" (maybe the pick up area is very small) so I now have a guest following me but I failed the checkpoint - As I never completed the checkpoint I cannot ask the guest to stop following me (I guess I could wait for a drift and then "re-pick" him up)
